manicminer.config.title: Manic Miner
manicminer.config.requires_hotkey: Requires hotkey to activate vein mining
manicminer.config.requires_hotkey.toolti: Whether the hotkey (defaults to V) needs to be pressed in order to vein mine.
manicminer.config.must_sneak: Must sneak to activate vein mining
manicminer.config.must_sneak.tooltip:
Whether the player must be sneaking to be able to vein mine.
Warning: if you turn this off, all mining operations will be vein mining!
manicminer.config.allow_common: Allow vein mining of common blocks (tunnel mode)
manicminer.config.allow_common.tooltip:
Whether tunnel mode is active.
This allows you to vein mine a set of common blocks (e.g. stone),
which will be mined out in a straight line in front of you (like a tunnel).
manicminer.config.remove_common_around_o: Remove common blocks around ore veins
Whether the adjecent blocks around an ore vein are mined too.
manicminer.config.summon_items: Teleport items to initial broken block
manicminer.config.summon_items.tooltip: Whether to bring all broken items to the initial breaking point.
manicminer.config.orelimit.tooltip: Number of (same type) ore blocks mined in one vein.
manicminer.config.commonlimit.tooltip: Number of (same type) common blocks mined in "tunnel" mode. This also applies to the surrounding blocks when mining an ore vein.
manicminer.config.woodlimit.tooltip: Number of (same type) tree logs mined when vein mining a tree.
